channel.title: Higher webclient revisions
channel.description: I feel that as the private servers are moving well up into the 700+ there should be more available revisions to choose from for the top list pages, including web clients available for them. I understand past concerns about conflict with Jagex over having revisions that are too close to runescape's, but I feel that now with RuneScape headed into RS3 it's safe to work with client revisions in the 600s at least. Just something to throw out there for consideration, I think it'd be a nice feature and bring more traffic to Mopar. Not to mention how simple an addition it would be. What does everyone else think?

item.title: Higher webclient revisions
item.dc:creator: @roflmaodude1 roflmaodude1
item.description:
